title: Love to Treasure Dad Cross Urn Pendant - Memorial Ash Keepsake - Cremation Jewelry
features: Urn Pendant designed to hold a small 'token' amount of a loved one’s ashes
Solid Stainless Steel and comes with Presentation Gift Box and Funnel
Measuring approximately 2.8cm/1.10" in height and 2.2cm/0.86" in width.
description: This beautiful piece of high quality jewelry is designed to hold a small 'token' amount of your loved one's ashes, ensuring that there is always a part of them held close to your heart. This highly polished, solid 316L Stainless Steel pendant is in the shape of a cross with 'Dad' inscribed on it . Measuring approximately 2.8cm/1.10" in height and 2.2cm/0.86" in width. The solid 316L Stainless Steel ‘box’ chain measures approximately 51cm (20”). Each Pendant comes beautifully presented in its own Gift Box along with a small plastic funnel to help when filling the pendant.
